component.description: Tree is is used for displaying hierarchical data and creating site navigations.
component.attributes:
&standard_uicomponent_attributes; &widget_var_attribute;
value false java.lang.Object A TreeNode instance as the backing model. true
var false java.lang.String Name of the request-scoped variable that'll be used to refer each treenode data during rendering. true
dynamic false java.lang.Boolean false Specifies the ajax/client toggleMode. Default is false.
cache false java.lang.Boolean true Specifies caching on dynamically loaded nodes. When set to true expanded nodes will be kept in memory. Default is true.
onNodeClick false java.lang.String Javascript event to process when a tree node is clicked.
selection false java.lang.Object true TreeNode array to reference the selections.
style false java.lang.String Style of the main container element of tree.
styleClass false java.lang.String Style class of the main container element of tree.
selectionMode false java.lang.String true Defines the selectionMode.
highlight false java.lang.Boolean true Highlights nodes on hover when selection is enabled, set to false to disable highlighting.
datakey false java.lang.Object Unique key of the data presented by tree nodes.
animate false java.lang.Boolean false When enabled, Displays slide effect during toggling of a node.
orientation false java.lang.String vertical Defines the orientation of the tree, valid values are, "vertical" (default) and horizontal.
propagateSelectionUp false java.lang.Boolean true Defines upwards selection propagation for checkbox mode, default is true.
propagateSelectionDown false java.lang.Boolean true Defines upwards selection propagation for checkbox mode, default is true.
dir false java.lang.String ltr Defines text direction, valid values are "ltr" (default) and "rtl".
draggable false java.lang.Boolean false Controls dragging of tree nodes. Default is false.
droppable false java.lang.Boolean false Controls dropping of tree nodes. Default is false.
dragdropScope false java.lang.String Scope key to group a set of tree components for transferring nodes using drag and drop.
dragMode false java.lang.String self Defines parent-child relationship when a node is dragged, valid values are self (default), parent and ancestor.
dropRestrict false java.lang.String none Defines parent-child restrictions when a node is dropped valid values are none (default) and sibling.
required false java.lang.Boolean false Validation constraint for selection. true
requiredMessage false java.lang.String Message for required selection validation. true
skipChildren false java.lang.Boolean false Ignores processing of children during lifecycle, improves performance if table only has output components, default is false. true
showUnselectableCheckbox false java.lang.Boolean false Defines if in checkbox selection mode, a readonly checkbox should be displayed for an unselectable node. Default is false. true
tabindex false java.lang.Integer 0 Position of the element in the tabbing order. Default is 0.
nodeVar false java.lang.String Name of the request-scoped variable that'll be used to refer current treenode using EL. true
